page.title: 17Youth Training in Aston
page.content: Before 1981 someone lived at Glebe House. In 1981{Man Power Services {asked}Father Wright to set up a Youth Training Scheme.The reason for this is the{problem of unemployment}for the young school leaver in this area. Before{the Youth Training{Scheme, {there was a Youth}Opportunities Scheme,which started in January 1982. Glebe House is the central office for the Youth Training Scheme in Aston.The scheme has been going nearly 4 years.On the scheme they are allowed 50 trainees but at present there are only 42.The trainees work for only one year on the scheme. The upper storey is made into offices and a computer room.The bottom part is for church meetings and sometimes other groups hire it.
